Here is a little project I have been working on , off and on since before release, and with every new mod patch I find something I wanted to change or make use of. So here is it's current version The Bug 2.0. 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/1LpQl)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-07T14:57:13Z" title="06/07/2015 02:57  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 7, 2015</time> by Doc Nocturnal**

Looks nice. By the way, you can link the Imgur album directly to the forum post by using the imgur tags. Simply put the album's ID (the little string of characters in the URL) between the tags. In your case, the ID would be 1LpQl.

Like this (this is a screenshot of the tag code, not actual text, otherwise it would post the album):

![MtIlgZs.png](http://i.imgur.com/MtIlgZs.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-07T14:01:26Z" title="06/07/2015 02:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 7, 2015</time> by CaptainKorhonen**

Thanks for the tip, I have trying to figure that out for a few days now! Just wish there was a way for us to color our creations, would love for this to be blue and yellow.
